shri lankawe ho in pitatha sita prawruththi palakarana web adawi janamadhyaye piligath sadacharathmaka pramithinta saha merata pawathina nithiyata anukulawa pawathwagena yana lesa janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyanshaya illa siti.siyaluma web adawi haki ikmanin janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyanshaye liyapadinchi karaganimata kriyakarana lesada amathyanshaya niwedanayak nikuth karamina illa siti.atham web adawiwala palakerena samahara wartha mangin apahasayata saha charitha ghathanayata lak wu wiwidha pirisgen janamadhya ha prawruththi amathyanshayata paminili labemin pawathina bawath, me web adawi wiwidha pudgalayan ilakka kara ganimin apahasathmaka menma asathya, hanikara puwath pala karana bawata nirikshanaya wi athi bawath niwedanaye sandahan we.
